reviewText: Just to comment on the movie itself; I've seen it before and the cover explains it all. It tells what the movie is about so if you are going to purchase it then know to expect, which is crackheads doing stupid stuff. Ijbh

Yeah, the title tells you what it is and you need to have an
open mind and about an hour to watch this. Tells the story of
crackheads in New York and the different things they do in the
streets. Someone paid them some money to do stupid stuff. If you
liked Jackass on MTV then you'll like this. In my opinion, if
you want a good laugh, then purchase it. If you are going to
critique it, then it's not for you. NEO_SOUL_06

This has to be THE dumbest DVD ever. With the expection of 3 people, everyone filmed were crazy people on the street. CHGW 1 was a good look in the life of the crack head way past bottom. This was a waste of video, my time and money. If I could give this less than a star I would.
